QuestData.Title: Mossy Fate
QuestData.Description: Your wolf queen will not let me out of her sight.$b$bThe children of the magnaron may have destroyed my village but it was the children of the genesaur who took my people.$b$bThe botani and their minions drag our people to the Razorbloom, and if we see them again, it is not as they were in life.$b$BYou have already helped the Skulls, so I ask your help again.$b$bEnter the Razorbloom and search for my people that were recently taken.$b$bPerhaps they may even be alive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search for Torg Earkeeper, Meka the Face Chewer, and Chag the Noseless in Razorbloom.
QuestData.RewardText: Dead? All dead? Dead and mulched and forgotten. No Chag with his missing nose or Meka with her love for chewing faces.$b$bAnd Torg, my beloved Torg. A son we had together. A son that is still missing.$b$bThe botani will pay for this. They will burn for this.
